snippet.title: Engie Benjy - Time for Teamwork!: Mobile Mix-Up (2003)
snippet.description:
In this game, you can go on a bike ride!

Engie Benjy and all his friends have shared a lovely picnic.
When they go home, they forget to take their mobile phones!
You'll have to help Messenger Mo and Bike deliver the phones back to them.

The world of Engie Benjy is shown on screen.
Mo and Bike can be moved using the mouse or the arrow keys.
The map in the top right-hand corner of the screen illustrates where everybody lives.
If you click on it, a bigger version will appear, so that you can see where you are and where to go next.
Sometimes. there will be obstacles on the road!

All the mobile phones are different, according to each character.
The one to be delivered next will be shown in the bottom right-hand corner of the screen.

Dedicated to RetroPokeFan.
